1.title: Dogs

episode of.title: My Life as an Animal (TV Series 2009– )

1.plot: Extreme sportsman Ed Leigh moves into a kennel with 33 male foxhounds while model Lucy Clarkson tries life as sheepdog on a working sheep farm.

2.title: Horses

episode of.title: My Life as an Animal (TV Series 2009– )

2.plot: With the help of horse behaviour experts, two more aspirant Dr Dolittles learn to sleep like a horse, eat like a horse and communicate like a horse.

3.title: Penguins and Seals

episode of.title: My Life as an Animal (TV Series 2009– )

3.plot: This week, farmers daughter Char Counsell becomes a Harbour Seal while extreme sportsman Johno Verity becomes a Humboldt Penguin.

4.title: Pigs

episode of.title: My Life as an Animal (TV Series 2009– )

4.plot: Two brave individuals volunteer to experience life as Pigs for four long days. They sleep with pigs, eat like pigs and even learn to speak like pigs.

5.title: Wildest Moments

episode of.title: My Life as an Animal (TV Series 2009– )

5.plot: The final episode in the series revisits the finest moments from the previous programs and asks the brave contributors to tell their story.

imdb.title: My Life as an Animal
akas: My Life as an Animal (United Kingdom)
plot: _My Life as an Animal_ (qv) is a television series broadcast on BBC Three and presented by Rebecca Wilcox.
